alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Tuscaloosa; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:59PM CDT until July 22 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WALKER...NORTHEASTERN TUSCALOOSA AND WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Sylvan Springs, or 11 miles northwest of Hueytown, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Western Birmingham, Hueytown, Pleasant Grove, Adamsville, Sylvan Springs, Mulga, Maytown, Bull City, Edgewater, McDonald Chapel, Concord, Bankhead Lock And Dam, Minor, Windham Springs, Birmingport, Docena and Little Shoal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
